an7.49:1.1: “Sattima, bhikkhave, sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an7.49:1.3: Asubhasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, aniccasanna, anicce dukkhasanna, dukkhe anattasanna.
an7.49:1.4: Ima kho, bhikkhave, satta sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosanati.
an7.49:2.1: ‘Asubhasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti.
an7.49:2.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an7.49:2.3: Asubhasannaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasa bahulam viharato methunadhammasamapattiya cittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.
an7.49:2.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kukkutapattam va nharudaddulam va aggimhi pakkhittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati.
an7.49:2.5: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asubhasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato methunadhammasamapattiya cittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.
an7.49:3.1: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asubhasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato methunadhammasamapattiya cittam anusandahati appatikulyata santhati;
an7.49:3.2: veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘abhavita me asubhasanna, natthi me pubbenaparam viseso, appattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
an7.49:3.4: Sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asubhasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato methunadhammasamapattiya cittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati upekkha va patikulyata va santhati;
an7.49:3.5: veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘subhavita me asubhasanna, atthi me pubbenaparam viseso, pattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
an7.49:3.7: ‘Asubhasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti,
an7.49:3.8: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an7.49:4.1: ‘Maranasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti, iti kho panetam vuttam kincetam paticca vuttam?
an7.49:4.2: Maranasannaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasa bahulam viharato jivitanikantiya cittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.
an7.49:4.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kukkutapattam va nharudaddulam va aggimhi pakkhittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati.
an7.49:4.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno maranasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato jivitanikantiya cittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.

an7.49:5.5: veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘subhavita me maranasanna, atthi me pubbenaparam viseso, pattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
an7.49:5.7: ‘Maranasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti,
an7.49:5.8: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an7.49:6.1: ‘Ahare patikulasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti, iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
an7.49:6.2: Ahare patikulasannaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasa bahulam viharato rasatanhaya cittam patiliyati …pe… upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.
an7.49:6.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kukkutapattam va nharudaddulam va aggimhi pakkhittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati.

an7.49:7.1: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ahare patikulasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato rasatanhaya cittam anusandahati appatikulyata santhati;

an7.49:7.8: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an7.49:8.1: ‘Sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti, iti kho panetam vuttam.
an7.49:8.3: Sabbaloke anabhiratasannaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasa bahulam viharato lokacitresu cittam patiliyati …pe…
an7.49:8.4: seyyathapi bhikkhave …pe… patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati.
an7.49:8.5: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sabbaloke anabhiratasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato lokacitresu cittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.

an7.49:9.2: veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘abhavita me sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, natthi me pubbenaparam viseso, appattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
an7.49:9.4: Sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sabbaloke anabhiratasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato lokacitresu cittam patiliyati …pe… upekkha va patikulyata va santhati;

an7.49:9.7: ‘Sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti,
an7.49:9.8: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an7.49:10.1: ‘Aniccasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti, iti kho panetam vuttam.
an7.49:10.3: Aniccasannaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasa bahulam viharato labhasakkarasiloke cittam patiliyati …pe… upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.
an7.49:10.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kukkutapattam va nharudaddulam va aggimhi pakkhittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati na sampasariyati.
an7.49:10.5: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aniccasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato labhasakkarasiloke cittam patiliyati …pe… upekkha va patikulyata va santhati.
an7.49:11.1: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aniccasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato labhasakkarasiloke cittam anusandahati appatikulyata santhati;
an7.49:11.2: veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘abhavita me aniccasanna, natthi me pubbenaparam viseso, appattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
an7.49:11.4: Sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aniccasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato labhasakkarasiloke cittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati, na sampasariyati upekkha va patikulyata va santhati;
an7.49:11.5: veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘subhavita me aniccasanna, atthi me pubbenaparam viseso, pattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
an7.49:11.7: ‘Aniccasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti,
an7.49:11.8: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an7.49:12.1: ‘Anicce dukkhasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti, iti kho panetam vuttam.
an7.49:12.3: Anicce dukkhasannaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasa bahulam viharato alasye kosajje vissatthiye pamade ananuyoge apaccavekkhanaya tibba bhayasanna paccupatthita hoti, seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ukkhittasike vadhake.
an7.49:13.1: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno anicce dukkhasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato alasye kosajje vissatthiye pamade ananuyoge apaccavekkhanaya tibba bhayasanna, na paccupatthita hoti, seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ukkhittasike vadhake.
an7.49:13.2: Veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘abhavita me anicce dukkhasanna, natthi me pubbenaparam viseso, appattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
an7.49:13.4: Sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno anicce dukkhasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato alasye kosajje vissatthiye pamade ananuyoge apaccavekkhanaya tibba bhayasanna paccupatthita hoti, seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ukkhittasike vadhake.
an7.49:13.5: Veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘subhavita me anicce dukkhasanna, atthi me pubbenaparam viseso, pattam me bhavanabalan’ti.

an7.49:14.1: ‘Dukkhe anattasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana’ti, iti kho panetam vuttam.
an7.49:14.3: Dukkhe anattasannaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasa bahulam viharato imasminca savinnanake kaye bahiddha ca sabbanimittesu ahankaramamankaramanapagatam manasam hoti vidhasamatikkantam santam suvimuttam.
an7.49:15.1: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dukkhe anattasannaparicitena cetasa bahulam viharato imasminca savinnanake kaye bahiddha ca sabbanimittesu na ahankaramamankaramanapagatam manasam hoti vidhasamatikkantam santam suvimuttam.
an7.49:15.2: Veditabbametam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna ‘abhavita me dukkhe anattasanna, natthi me pubbenaparam viseso, appattam me bhavanabalan’ti.
